pkgmetadata.longdescription: R-Language Based Calculus Operations for Teaching // Software to support the introductory *MOSAIC Calculus* textbook https://www.mosaic-web.org/MOSAIC-Calculus/), one of many data- and modeling-oriented educational resources developed by Project MOSAIC (https://www.mosaic-web.org/). Provides symbolic and numerical differentiation and integration, as well as support for applied linear algebra (for data science), and differential equations/dynamics. Includes grammar-of-graphics- based functions for drawing vector fields, trajectories, etc. The software is suitable for general use, but intended mainly for teaching calculus.
